workflow.name: Generate book summaries with GPT-4o, Google APIs & Amazon Affiliate Links
workflow.description:
**Description:** Your personal AI Book Curator that reads reviews, recommends books, and supports affiliate links. üìöü§ñ

This advanced workflow acts as a complete "Reading Assistant Application" with monetization features. It takes a book title via form, researches it using Google APIs, and employs an OpenAI Agent to generate a summary and recommendations.

Why use this template?

Monetization Support: Just enter your Amazon Affiliate Tag in the config node, and all email links will automatically include your tag.

Organized & Scalable: The workflow is clearly grouped into 4 sections (Input, Enrichment, AI, Delivery) with sticky notes for easy navigation.

## How it works:

Input: User submits a book title (e.g., "Atomic Habits").

Research: The workflow fetches book metadata and searches for real-world reviews.

Analyze: GPT-4o explains why the book is interesting and suggests 3 related reads.

Deliver: Generates a beautiful HTML email with purchase links and logs the request to Google Sheets.

## Setup Requirements:

Google Sheets: Create headers: date, book_title, author, ai_comment, user_email.

Credentials: OpenAI, Google Custom Search, Gmail, Google Sheets.

Config: Open the "1. Input & Config" section to enter API Keys and IDs.

workflow.name: AI Book Advisor: Reviews & Recommendations (Final Layout)

parameters.content:
# AI Book Advisor with Affiliate Support

## How it works
This workflow acts as an automated book curator.
1. **Trigger:** Starts when a user submits a book title via the form.
2. **Research:** Fetches metadata from Google Books and search results for reviews.
3. **Analysis:** GPT-4o analyzes the gathered info to write a summary and suggest related books.
4. **Delivery:** Sends a formatted HTML email containing Amazon affiliate links and logs the entry to Google Sheets.

## Setup steps
1. **Google Sheets:** Create a sheet with headers: `date`, `book_title`, `author`, `ai_comment`, `user_email`.
2. **Credentials:** Configure OpenAI, Google Custom Search, and Gmail.
3. **Config:** Open the **"1. Input & Config"** section to enter your API Keys and Amazon Affiliate Tag.

## 1. Input & Config
Accepts user requests via Form and defines API keys/tags.

## 2. Data Enrichment
Retrieves book details (Google Books) and search results (Custom Search) for context.

## 3. AI Analysis
GPT-4o summarizes reviews and recommends related books in JSON format.

## 4. Delivery & Log
Builds an HTML email with affiliate links, sends it, and saves data to Sheets.

parameters.formDescription: Enter a book title. AI will research it and send you a summary with recommendations.

nodes.name: Search Book on Google Books API

user.bio:
Web Marketer & Automation Consultant

With a background in web production at Recruit and over a decade of experience serving major enterprises, I specialize in combining Web Marketing with AI Automation. I help businesses adopt "new ways of working" through digital transformation.

My Expertise:

Web Marketing: GA4 migration and in-house team training.

AI Automation: Using tools like n8n to streamline marketing and back-office workflows for maximum efficiency.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
